draw: background(220); let h = hour(); let m = minute(); let s = second(); translate(cx, cy); strokeWeight(10); stroke('black'); circle(0, 0, w); push(); let hDeg = (map(h % 12, 0, 12, 0, 360) + 270) % 360; rotate(hDeg); stroke('blue'); line(0, 0, 0.40 * cx, 0); pop(); push(); let mDeg = (map(m, 0, 60, 0, 360) + 270) % 360; rotate(mDeg); stroke('green'); line(0, 0, 0.69 * cx, 0); pop(); push(); let sDeg = (map(s, 0, 60, 0, 360) + 270) % 360; rotate(sDeg); stroke('red'); line(0, 0, 0.95 * cx, 0); pop();
